answers.answer: Hi, I am a type 2 diabetic as well.  When I do have soda it is always diet.  I never noticed any increased levels in my blood glucose levels tho.  Try one for a day or two, monitor your levels and see if they affect anything.  Something that I do is look at the lables when I am not sure if something is  ok for me.  When you do this compare the lables from a diet soda to a regular soda and see what they look like, this will pretty much give you a answer as well.
SOMETIME DIET SODA IS SOMETIME HARMFUL IF U DRINK 2 MUCH
Thanks for that bit of info.  Don't drink alot of it just everyonce in a while.
